0: OSI level at which the traffic occurs
1: Levels comprised by the higher communication layer
2: Levels comprised by the lower communication layer

0: NOTE:	In some vertical application, level 3 to 6 are not implemented.
1: NOTE:	In some vertical application, level 3 to 6 are not implemented.
2: NOTE:	In some vertical application, level 3 to 6 are not implemented.
